item.title: How to apply filters on your photo | PhotoGrid Tutorial
item.description: Crop, rotation, resize, blur and beautify your photos easily, you can even frame your images in Instagram's 1:1 aspect ratio! Add stickers, texts, backgrounds, graffiti, boarders and pixelization, or adjust your photo's brightness, contrast, saturation and layout! The latest smart facial recognition tech helps soften wrinkles, even out skin tones and remove blemishes instantly with a single tap. *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;"
